general_advisory: Deworming and vaccination against Foot and Mouth Disease and Brucellosis should be advised in animals.

advisory: False smut disease may be seen in paddy field. To manage the same, spray Propiconazole or Hexaconazole @ 100 ml or Copper oxychloride @ 250 g in 200 lt of water per acre.

Neck Blast diseases may be seen in paddy field. To control Neck Blast diseases, first drain out excess water from the paddy field. Then, spray Hexaconazole @ 400 ml/acre or Azoxystrobin+ Difenoconazole @ 200 ml/acre.
Harvesting of maize crop has started.
Sugarcane is at grand growth stage.

There are chances of Pod borer infestation in black gram crop. To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar in black gram crop, spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 ml/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC @ 80 ml/acre.
There are chances of Pod borer infestation in green gram crop. To manage Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram crop, spray Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG @ 80 ml/acre or Profenophos 50% EC @ 400 ml/acre.
Before sowing of seeds, seed treatment should be done with Carbendazim 50% WP @ 2g/kg or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5% D.S @ 3g/kg of seeds.
To manage the infestation of Fruit flies, spray Malathion @ 1 ml/lt.
To reduce the Phomopsis blight disease in brinjal, spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb Zineb 75% WP @ 500 g/acre in 200 litres of water.
